name: Only One Light (joaosdev, Kyx, Vasco Borges)
name_original: Only One Light (joaosdev, Kyx, Vasco Borges)
description:
Take your light ball to the end of the level before it runs out of power.

Support for Xbox gamepad.

Joystick might not work correctly with PS4, bud the DPad should be fine.

Last case scenario you can use the software DS4Windows to simulate an XBox gamepad.

And of course thank you to Inês

Controls

  Xbox  gamepad

    Move / Aim - Joystick / DPad

    Jump - A

    Kick - B

Playstation gamepad

  Move / Aim - Joystick / DPad

  Jump - X

  Kick - O

  Keyboard

    Move / Aim - Arrow Keys

    Jump - Z 

    Kick - X
